metadata.Title: CVE-2005-4095

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 for IBM POWER
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 for IBM zSeries 64bit
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 for IPF
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP1 for x86

metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in connector.php in the fckeditor2rc2 addon in DoceboLMS 2.0.4 allows remote attackers to list arbitrary files and directories via ".." sequences in the Type parameter in a GetFoldersAndFiles command.
